20101206191425.286|20101206191426.714|CCO|THAT.
20101206191426.714|20101206191428.143|CCO|NOW, IN THE UNITED STATES WE 
20101206191428.143|20101206191429.571|CCO|DON'T USUALLY CRIMINALLY CHARGE 
20101206191429.571|20101206191431.000|CCO|PEOPLE AFTER AN AIR CRASH.

20101206191433.000|20101206191435.000|CCO|MADE IT VERY IMPORTANT FOR

20101206191941.000|20101206191942.667|CCO|BY WIKILEAKS OPENED A WINDOW 
20101206191942.667|20101206191944.333|CCO|INTO A CONTROVERSIAL CENSORSHIP 
20101206191944.333|20101206191946.000|CCO|BATTLE IN CHINA.
20101206191946.000|20101206191947.667|CCO|IT'S BEEN HACKING INTO U.S. 
20101206191947.667|20101206191949.333|CCO|GOVERNMENT AND GOOGLE COMPUTERS 
20101206191949.333|20101206191951.000|CCO|NEARLY A DECADE AND THE HACKING 
20101206191951.000|20101206191952.250|CCO|OF GOOGLE HAS ALLEGEDLY BEEN 
20101206191952.250|20101206191953.500|CCO|OVERSEEN BY TOP OFFICIALS IN THE
20101206191953.500|20101206191954.750|CCO|CHINESE GOVERNMENT.
20101206191954.750|20101206191956.000|CCO|DEB FEYERICK HAS BEEN FOLLOWING 
20101206191956.000|20101206191957.250|CCO|THIS STORY AND IS LIVE FROM NEW 
20101206191957.250|20101206191958.500|CCO|YORK.
20101206191958.500|20101206191959.750|CCO|TELL US, DEB, WHAT THE CABLES 
20101206191959.750|20101206192001.000|CCO|REVEAL.
20101206192001.000|20101206192003.500|CCO|>> Reporter: WHAT'S SO 
20101206192003.500|20101206192006.000|CCO|INTERESTING IS THESE U.S. 
20101206192006.000|20101206192008.500|CCO|DIPLOMATIC CABLES SHOW JUST HOW 
20101206192008.500|20101206192011.000|CCO|FAR CHINA WAS WILLING TO GO IN 
20101206192011.000|20101206192012.429|CCO|AN ATTEMPT TO CENSOR CHINA.COM, 
20101206192012.429|20101206192013.857|CCO|CHINA GOOGLE BASICALLY.
20101206192013.857|20101206192015.286|CCO|THEY TARGETED IT POLITICALLY AND
20101206192015.286|20101206192016.714|CCO|ECONOMICALLY TRYING TO CENSOR 
20101206192016.714|20101206192018.143|CCO|THE INFORMATION AND THE SITE AND
20101206192018.143|20101206192019.571|CCO|ACCESS TO THE PEOPLE THAT WERE 
20101206192019.571|20101206192021.000|CCO|TRYING TO GET ON TO IT.
20101206192021.000|20101206192022.667|CCO|CLEARLY THERE WERE ATTEMPTS TO 
20101206192022.667|20101206192024.333|CCO|CENSOR THAT ACTUALLY BACK FIRED.
20101206192024.333|20101206192026.000|CCO|MORE PEOPLE BECAME INTERESTED IN
20101206192026.000|20101206192027.667|CCO|GOOGLE CHINA.
20101206192027.667|20101206192029.333|CCO|AT THE SAME TIME THEY WERE DOING
20101206192029.333|20101206192031.000|CCO|THIS, IT ALSO APPEARED THAT THEY
20101206192031.000|20101206192032.667|CCO|WERE SANCTIONING SOPHISTICATED 
20101206192032.667|20101206192034.333|CCO|ATTACKS FROM FREE LANCE HACKERS,
20101206192034.333|20101206192036.000|CCO|PEOPLE WHO WERE OUTSIDE THE 
20101206192036.000|20101206192037.667|CCO|GOVERNMENT WHO WERE WORKING IN 
20101206192037.667|20101206192039.333|CCO|CONJUNCTION WITH CHINESE 
20101206192039.333|20101206192041.000|CCO|OFFICIALS.
20101206192041.000|20101206192043.000|CCO|THE CONCLUSION IN ONE DIPLOMATIC
20101206192043.000|20101206192045.000|CCO|CABLE, QUOTE, USE OF ITS PRIVATE
20101206192045.000|20101206192047.000|CCO|SECTOR IN SUPPORT OF GOVERNMENT 
20101206192047.000|20101206192049.000|CCO|INFORMATION WHERE FAIR OBJECTIVE
20101206192049.000|20101206192051.000|CCO|ESPECIALLY IN ITS ABILITY TO 
20101206192051.000|20101206192052.429|CCO|GATHER, PROCESS AND EXPLOIT 
20101206192052.429|20101206192053.857|CCO|INFORMATION.
20101206192053.857|20101206192055.286|CCO|THAT CONFIRMING THE RELATIONSHIP
20101206192055.286|20101206192056.714|CCO|BETWEEN CHINESE OFFICIALS AND 
20101206192056.714|20101206192058.143|CCO|PRIVATE INDIVIDUALS.
20101206192058.143|20101206192059.571|CCO|THE CHINESE WERE ALSO VERY 
20101206192059.571|20101206192101.000|CCO|INTERESTED IN U.S. DATA AND IN 
20101206192101.000|20101206192102.667|CCO|ONE ATTACK IN 2008 THEY ACTUALLY
20101206192102.667|20101206192104.333|CCO|BROKE INTO A SYSTEM IN THE U.S. 
20101206192104.333|20101206192106.000|CCO|WITH A DOCUMENT THAT THEY HAD 
20101206192106.000|20101206192107.667|CCO|TITLED "SALARY INCREASE SURVEY 
20101206192107.667|20101206192109.333|CCO|AND FORECAST."
20101206192109.333|20101206192111.000|CCO|THEY WERE ABLE TO GET 50 
20101206192111.000|20101206192112.429|CCO|MEGABYTES OF DATA INCLUDING A 
20101206192112.429|20101206192113.857|CCO|WHOLE LIST OF NAMES AND PRIVATE 
20101206192113.857|20101206192115.286|CCO|PASSWORDS WHICH THEY WERE ABLE 
20101206192115.286|20101206192116.714|CCO|TO ACCESS.
20101206192116.714|20101206192118.143|CCO|OTHER ATTEMPTS DIDN'T PROVE AS 
20101206192118.143|20101206192119.571|CCO|SUCCESSFUL.
20101206192119.571|20101206192121.000|CCO|BUT THE CABLE SHOWS WHILE THEY

20101206192946.000|20101206192947.667|CCO|THANK YOU, JACQUI.
20101206192947.667|20101206192949.333|CCO|JACQUI IS LIKE ME.
